title: Error null is not an object (evaluating 'e.remove') after providing correct confirmation code [Android]
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: Android only: Error ``` null is not an object (evaluating 'e.remove') ``` after user provides correct confirmation code in Console. As a result, phone number is not saved in profile and contacts are not synchronised.
```
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: NAME: "TypeError"
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: MESSAGE: null is not an object (evaluating 'e.remove')
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: 
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: remove_sms_listener@index.android.bundle:12:6397773
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: G__40752_40754@index.android.bundle:12:6404125
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:4595566
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: invoke_interceptor_fn@index.android.bundle:12:4551530
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: invoke_interceptors@index.android.bundle:12:4551831
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: execute@index.android.bundle:12:4553449
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: handle@index.android.bundle:12:4563989
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_process_1st_event_in_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:4591258
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_run_queue$arity$1@index.android.bundle:12:4574640
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:4577820
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: re_frame$router$IEventQueue$_fsm_trigger$arity$3@index.android.bundle:12:4582031
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:12:4575942
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:32:1764
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: a@index.android.bundle:32:506
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: o@index.android.bundle:32:870
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: callImmediates@index.android.bundle:32:3165
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:2778
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: index.android.bundle:27:1360
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:2606
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:1330
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code]
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: value@index.android.bundle:27:938
01:07 I/ReactNativeJS: [native code]
```
#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)
Contacts from phone book are imported. Phone number is shown in profile. 
#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what actually happened.)
Error shown, no feedback about contacts imported in console, if open profile then phone number is shown but after app relaunch it's not shown
### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Open Console
- Tap on phone command
- Provide phone number where text message can be viewed
- tap on confirmation-code command
- type received confirmation code


### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: 0.9.13 release build 63
* Operating System: Android 8.1.0 and 6.0.1
